website_summaries.verdict: The one to choose if budget is your top concern. 4 convenient pump bottles for a low price.
pros: Formulated with vitamin E. Refreshing scent
cons: Can be drying, especially for dry or sensitive skin
Some complaints of broken or half-empty bottles upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Affordable bulk deal
customer_reviews.text: It's a good hand sanitizer, smells great, and feels nice and moisturizing. It's a great value for the money, especially compared to other more expensive brands. The only issue I had was in shipping. One of the bottles was opened when I received it, and had leaked all over the box. Two other bottles had twisted caps, shown in my photos. Luckily, the pumps weren't damaged, so they're still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The Industry Standard
customer_reviews.text: The industry standard for serious germaphobes with OCD. Been using this same brand for years. High quality and never leaves hands sticky. Great value for the price in the 4-pack so you can keep a bottle in every room and use to refill smaller bottles for travel.
customer_reviews.author: HPM Sales

customer_reviews.title: Feels sticky, filmy and scent is TOO SWEET
customer_reviews.text: The formula is too sticky and thick; after several applications, hands feel sticky,yucky, like you want to wash with soap and water so your hands will feel clean and fresh again. The scent is very sweet and fruity, almost sickeningly sweet!! Gross. Wish I could return these, but this item not eligible for refund! It's just sitting in the house, not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bottles
customer_reviews.text: These bottles arrived at my house broken and spilled all over. the pieces of the bottle were actually broken off. This is manufactured very cheap. Pick a better company to buy from. Defeats the purpose of sanitizer when something comes broken and spilled out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harper

customer_reviews.title: No nozzles..
customer_reviews.text: No nozzles, they were broken off and not even in the enclosed box. This tells me that they were broken BEFORE they were packaged, which is very much not cool. Ive grown to expect more from Amazon, I've always trusted them. Its exactly the product I expected, but not necessarily with all the functioning parts, and somebody knew this and didnt care. Its not a huge deal, I'll just save the plungers from the first bottle. But I'm surprised by the lack of care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update: my newborn has been kept from getting sick ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: my newborn has been kept from getting sick now as well. I have a big bottle out and available for everyone that walks in the door and they have to use it before even coming near my baby. With two at home and one on the way, this sanitizer has kept my kids and myself from getting sick multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Emett

customer_reviews.title: Seems Thinner Than Older Version, Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Sanitizer has been hard to come by during the quarantine, so I was thrilled to find this in 30 oz 4 pack! The bottles are huge and I'm using them as refills for my 10 oz Purrell sanitizer bottles. So each of these can fill a 10 oz sanitizer 3 times and is equivalent overall to having 12 smaller pump bottles of sanitizer. A great deal for the price point! It is effective at killing germs and keeping us healthy during this crazy time we're in. It does seem a little thinner than it used to be and not as thick as Purrell. Overall, very happy with these and they'll last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stabler

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not one item is a box of four!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the description correctly and didn’t realise one item is a box of four! So ended up buying way too many as ordered 4 boxes! With covid it was a blessing and was able to give some to friends who needed it. Nice product not drying and smells fresh
customer_reviews.author: Mel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: SATISFACTION 100%
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before. It's fragrance is thankfully not as strong as the other sanitizers. Also added to this equation, the quick & reliable shipment I received I am very content. The sellers used 2 boxes. One smaller box & also a second box as strong as the first but a bit larger to protect the inside box from any damage. BRAVO to the seller's shipping department. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: H. HAKIM

customer_reviews.title: She was disappointed with the consistency of the liquid but said it ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my mother who is bed ridden to have some thing to make sure her hands stay clean. She says this 4 containers are more then she will ever be able to use. She was disappointed with the consistency of the liquid but said it works.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: Anti- bacterial
customer_reviews.text: I leave one in the door of my car and every time before starting it. I take one pump and use on my hands and forearms. I believe it helps against germs. Although I wash my hands at least 15 times a day this is especially helpful after the gym or any store.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Glennon

customer_reviews.title: Strong tequila smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong tequila smell - smells nothing like the GermX I had bought pre-pandemic. Not sure I'll be able to use it due to it's strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I am on auto delivery for this hand sanitizer. I get 4 big bottles in a box and I put 2 in my classroom, one for boys, one for girls to use. I also have one on my desk. The other I use at home. This is the only sanitizer I can use because it does not dry my hand out and that is am awful feeling like I am wearing gloves. This is a great bargain and I will stay on auto delivery. Thanks Amazon for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great to have around no matter what
customer_reviews.text: SO glad to get these early before they all sold out (at the beginning of covid19) . Great to have around no matter what's going on!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal out there!
customer_reviews.text: I started ordering these last year for school. Students are required to bring in supplies such as hand sanitizer, tissues, wipes, etc. this is the best deal I've found in larger bottles and they are great for refilling the purse size bottles too. Highly recommend and I've already ordered and received the 4 pack for school for this year!
customer_reviews.author: phillygirl

customer_reviews.title: Does not work - period!  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money and a lawsuit against this company is forthcoming! The so called antibacterial is a scam as it was already investigated! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: seems a little thin
customer_reviews.text: i'm not sure if it's because of covid. the product is a lot more thinner than before. it was gel like and now it's more watered down. but i guess still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Sriracha

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a four pack of this hand sanitizer. It came in individual plastic bags but one was busted open and the cap on the bottle was loose causing a slight leak (very minimal). Just tightened the cap and rinsed off and everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.text: It took almost two months to finally get these, but they arrived safely with no leakage/breakage. All four bottles were full, and had pumps. It is genuine Germ-X product. These were purchased for my business use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc52

customer_reviews.title: Pump breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I hate the smell and the pump broke easily. Wish I never bought the 4 pack... stuck with them
customer_reviews.author: Guernica Jean-Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, not same as “original” germ-x
customer_reviews.text: Scent is not original germ-x scent and is watery. I wish I could find the same quality of germ-x as the original stuff before COVID.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Hands feel moisturized and sanitized
customer_reviews.text: This is the better hand sanitizer bc it doesn’t dry my hands out like the cheaper one that you find everywhere! This is the only one I use, since I constantly have to use it several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: I'm clean!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of hand sanitizer that per ounce is very cheap! I have a couple of smaller bottles for the car and work and i just refill from this, much cheaper. This also doesn't make your hands too sticky or too smooth! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoDave

customer_reviews.title: Big bottles are convenient.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after having our first baby. I've used it many times a day and my hands haven't dried out. Big bottle is convenient. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best deal saves time and money
customer_reviews.text: Best deal on sanitizer 4 large bottles saves me money and time as many stores I frequent are always out. Love the texture and the brand speaks for itself. Very happy with my order
customer_reviews.author: Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great with no drying alcohol. Needed several for flu season. This is a large size. Great scent , not overwhelming. Enough to fill your purse size too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Like the price for the size of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Like the price for the size of the bottle. Use to buy smaller bottle for business and they were easily misplaced, stolen, or idk where they disappear. Since I've bought these larger units, I don't need to buy Sanitizer as often. Saving money always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product that made in USA .  Yeahh
customer_reviews.text: Since everyone is so worried about coronavirus, it is so hard for me to find any hand sanitizer available out there. I am so glad I bought these for such a good price. The bottles came fine, undamaged, with the expiration of 2023. Would love to buy from you again. Be safe wherever you are. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lan vu

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I commute from many different locations in a daily basis for work. Having one of these is a godsend after leaving a few certain types of appts. The bottles are large too, and they last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas V.

customer_reviews.title: Pumps broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Half of the pump heads were broken on arrival. Replacement shipment came in a scented/aloe flavor that I don't care for.
customer_reviews.author: JamesV

customer_reviews.title: Great price for value pack!
customer_reviews.text: We use germx like nobody’s business. Awesome to find large value packs. So we could take some to school and keep plenty at home. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: The brand i trust
customer_reviews.text: Happy to buy germ x hand sanitize the brand i trust . Good for protect myself ang family.
customer_reviews.author: Truc

customer_reviews.title: The best hand sanitizer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is D best and sanitize are out there it doesn't have a lingering smell. I need definitely kills the germs.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Hirsh

customer_reviews.title: Safe Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Was lucky to find them during this time. Took a little bit to arrive but they all arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Varela

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is tasteless, and the big bottle is very good. I'm so glad I got such a big bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Show

customer_reviews.title: Works well, affordable for this much product
customer_reviews.text: This product delivers on expectations as usual! Great value for the size of the bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Jamie

customer_reviews.title: santitizer
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like the smell and neither does one of my dogs! Other than that it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Angie VanOrnam

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bottles were bigger than I expected. Great value for the money. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Smells great! Doesn’t try hands!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! Smells like hondew melon and hands aren’t dried out and cracked. I use this a lot with a newborn in the home.
customer_reviews.author: MomWifeStylist

customer_reviews.title: germX is the best and this price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT price, arrived package well, the product smells good, not medicinal.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good product but leaves a residue after using. I would recommend Purell over this prodt.

customer_reviews.title: Lovethis
customer_reviews.text: Glad i ordered this but my shipment was all messed up and leaked everywhere, but i will take it as is because product is always out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, I use it to fill up my smaller containers around my house and work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scented
customer_reviews.text: Liked the value, size, the only thing I don’t like is the scent. It’s a very strong scent and felt they should have labeled it as a scented product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: about 1/3 are simply impossible to open---you end up having ...
customer_reviews.text: about 1/3 are simply impossible to open---you end up having to funnel liquid to other bottles etc---just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a better choice than
customer_reviews.text: Received it quite fast!! I much prefer the smell and texture of this rather than most the others! Definitely a better choice than Purell

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hand Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the best hand sanitizer money can buy. This really works.

customer_reviews.title: Was not germ-x, filled with something else!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely not germ-x, it was filled with something different. I love germ-x original & this was not gem-x. Very upset about this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A bit too sticky
customer_reviews.text: The sanitizer is thick and leaves sticky feeling even after it dries. Not a fan.

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE these the bottles I received were opened and filled with another hand sanitizer the odor on these is horrible do not waste your time or money.0

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy - 4 huge bottles and each has the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy - 4 huge bottles and each has the pump on them, making it really convenient. Definitely will purchase again when needed!
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for quality and quantity. Perfect for several locations in the house: entry way after walking the dog, diaper station after a quick diaper change, and make up table.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal compared to store prices. Use it at work constantly. Doesn’t dry my hands out like some kinds of sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Compare this to purell. It gives excellent value. Alcohol content is 10% less but same effect.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Huge bottles. Pumps work well. As expected. Only negative is pump won’t get last half inch out well.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing buy, just great for the office. I love the price
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: i was so happy to receive this. My son and husband are essential workers and I was making hand sanitizer at home which wasn't the best. These were 4 big bottles just as described.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid's classroom supplies. The price was good for the quantity of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I love this sanitizer because it doesn’t reek of alcohol like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this sanitizer because it doesn’t reek of alcohol like some other brands do, and the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: yekaterina balagian

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an essential supply
customer_reviews.text: Germ X is an essential supply both at home and school! It’s becoming harder and harder to find. Great deal on four bottles!

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom. The kids and I use it daily. It smells nice and isn't sticky when it is dry.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: We got these to have all over the house for when we brought our new born home and love them.

customer_reviews.title: Hospital-grade great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Everything you get out of hospital grade hand sanitizer hand cleaner buy it it's a steal for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for much need hand sanitizer!
customer_reviews.text: Glad these bottles had pumps to them! All 4 bottles came in great condition!

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the car door side pocket and the diaper bag. I carry these everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Germ-X is hands down one of the best hand sanitizers. It dries quickly and doesn’t leave your hands feeling sticky.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my aunt and they arrived in perfect condition. No leaking at all! What I received matched the description.

customer_reviews.title: ok, but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not the best smelling hand sanitizer on the market

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE hand sanitizer by far!
customer_reviews.text: I teach kindergarten and I order this stuff regularly. It’s the only hand sanitizer that I can stand the smell of and I can use all day long without my hands getting overly dry. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great for classroom! My students are very aware of flu season and are always making sure to sanitize after sneezing or coughing.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and you get a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: Fake germx
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the original GermX, consistency is very watery and smells horrible like someone made it at home and put it in the GermX bottle. It’s a scam! GermX sanitizers has little air bubbles in it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Staple in our house
customer_reviews.text: A must have with little boys that tend to not wash their hands, but they love using germ x
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: all four were in perfect condition. I was a little worried about some ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all; all four were in perfect condition. I was a little worried about some of the reviews, but all is well. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Received the package great however 2 of the bottles were broken the pumps didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.author: manisha

customer_reviews.title: No pump top
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviewers. Came with no pump top, as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are huge. I haven't even made it through 1/4 of one of the bottles in a month!

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: While there is not enough suds or bubbles to create a soapy feel, I don't really minded it. As long as it kills germs. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and I don't feel my hands get dry from using it.

customer_reviews.text: AMAZING germX is the only hand sanitizer I use and others leave my hands feeling sticky, I thoroughly enjoy the GermX product and for .17 per ounce, you can't go wrong. The items arrived in a box and i have enough for both home and office. With Winter and the cold season coming up, I like to have a bottle of this stuff in the car as well. The bottle is small enough that it can easily be moved around my home and office, but large enough that i feel it will last for a longer period of time.

product_meta.title: Germ-X Hand Sanitizer, Original, Pump Bottle, 30 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
product_meta.description: Germ-X Hand Sanitizer, Original, Pump Bottle, 30 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4) Kills 99.99% of many common harmful germs and bacteria in as little as 15 seconds. Active Ingredients - Ethyl Alcohol 63%. Inactive Ingredients - Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Benzophenone-4, Fragrance, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Water
feature_bullets: Kills 99.99% of many common harmful germs and bacteria in as little as 15 seconds
Great alternative when soap and water are not available
Fits on any desk, counter or sink
